content: DGH 130 Concrete grinder Concrete grinder for grinding and finishing of wall surfaces ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Grinders and sanders- - - ### FEATURES:Features Dedicated grinding system – purpose-built to deliver much higher productivity than conventional angle grinders Ergonomic head grip – for full control and comfortable hold when working in any position Speed selection for better control on every surface Virtually dust-free when used with a compatible Hilti vacuum cleaner Adjustable dust hood for grinding edges and corners Applications Surface grinding on concrete walls, joints and formwork Surface finishing of concrete walls ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 5.6 lb. Base material: Concrete, Cement No load RPM: gear 1: 3000 rpm; gear 2: 4100 rpm; gear 3: 5200 rpm; gear 4: 6400 rpm; gear 5: 7400 rpm; gear 6: 8700 rpm Technical Data | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 5.6 lb | Base material | Concrete, Cement | No load RPM | gear 1: 3000 rpm; gear 2: 4100 rpm; gear 3: 5200 rpm; gear 4: 6400 rpm; gear 5: 7400 rpm; gear 6: 8700 rpm | Arbor size | 22.2 mm | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 88 dB (A) | 1 | Rated input power | 1300 W | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3625037 - DGH 130 (2) + VC 300-17X + Splitter - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2x DGH 130 120V Diamond grinder - 2x DG-CW 125/5 SPX Diamond cup wheel univ - 1x VC 300-17 X 120V woS Univ. vacuum cleaner - 1x Vacuum Y splitter - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 1x Hose 36mm x 4.6m (15 ft) anti-static - 3628491 - DGH 130 120V DLX (3-Pack) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3x DGH 130 120V Diamond grinder - 3x DG-CW 125/5 SPX Diamond cup wheel univ - 3x DGH 130 230 V DL X Case - 3625040 - DGH 130 (3-Pack) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3x DGH 130 120V Diamond grinder - 3x DG-CW 125/5 SPX Diamond cup wheel univ - 3686202 - DGH 130 DLX Chamfer Grinding Combo - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DGH 130 120V Diamond grinder - 1x DG-CW 125/5 SPX Diamond cup wheel univ - 1x DGH 130 230 V DL X Case - 1x Diamond Cup DGH 130 5 SPX Turbo A - 1x 0.5 INCH Adapter - 1x 1 INCH Adapter - 1x 0.75 INCH Adapter - 1x 1.5 INCH Adapter - 1x KONZEPT B 2 Base module - 1x KONZEPT B 1 Base module - 3686201 - DGH 130 Chamfer Grinding Combo - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DGH 130 120V Diamond grinder - 1x DG-CW 125/5 SPX Diamond cup wheel univ - 1x DGH 130 230 V DL X Case - 1x Diamond Cup DGH 130 5 SPX Turbo A - 1x 0.5 INCH Adapter - 1x 1 INCH Adapter - 1x 0.75 INCH Adapter -
